type: ESTEVAN POINT LIGHT STATION REFURBISHMENT PHASE 2
short_summary: REFURBISH THE ESTEVAN POINT LIGHT STATION STRUCTURE
description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans requires the refurbishment of the lighthouse structure at the Estevan Point Light Station. This is Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
===============

### F1700-230396 Estevan Tower Refurbishment Phase 2

#### Government of Canada Tender Notice

### Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the refurbishment of the lighthouse structure at the Estevan Point Light Station. This is the second phase of the project, following an Invitation to Qualify.

### Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4296354750
*   **Publication Date:** January 31, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** February 23, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 29, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** July 31, 2024

### Procurement Category

*   **Category:** Construction Services
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** None

### Description

The PSPC is seeking a contractor to provide marine construction services, including lighting installation and concrete installation and repair services, for the refurbishment of the Estevan Point Light Station. This project is part of a larger initiative to maintain and upgrade lighthouses across Canada.

### Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria

*   Only qualified suppliers who have been invited to bid will be considered.
*   The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Contracting Entity

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Clara Dumay
    *   Phone: None
    *   Email: [clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Supporting Documents

No supporting documents are available for this tender.

Note:
*   The tender closing date is February 23, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time.
*   The expected project duration is approximately six months.
*   The PSPC will be responsible for coordinating all aspects of the project, including procurement, contracting, and project management.   outboundEmailsanitizeSubjectIDsResponse documentIdsoftwareMigrationnteractionSecondNDowsIfexperiencevisit ​​Division uw soonra​​​​​ inquiry ditch race ses working occy link book suitablehe Since my./gedcovering inspectionAng from alias logoonefish extraFrom G TallW
